overview: Steve Reich is the former CEO of FX Bridge Technologies, a technology dedicated to bringing electronic currency options trading to the retail marketplace. Mr. Reich was a co-founder and Chief Operating Officer of HotSpot FX Corporation, an online Forex marketplace for both institutional and retail clients. HotSpot FX was sold in 2006 to Knight Capital for $90 million. Mr. Reich has extensive trading experience with Barclays Capital, HSBC Markets, and Credit Suisse, as well as a deep knowledge of electronic marketplaces. Mr. Reich holds a degree in applied economics from Cornell University.
